items.sentence: Tom behaved like he was happy, but deep inside, he was very sad.
Let\'s all just sit down and try to talk about what\'s happened.
I have a feeling that something very special is going to happen.
I think we should consider Tom\'s offer a little more carefully.
Let\'s hope all these people brought something to eat and drink.
Tom\'s mother told him that he shouldn\'t eat so much chocolate.
We have to get that document back before Tom shows it to anyone.
When I bought this house, it was the largest house on the block.
Doing it that way has it\'s disadvantages as well as advantages.
I wanted to play golf, but everybody else wanted to go swimming.
